title: 880-03 Kashf al-lithām ʻan asʼilat al-anām : manuscript / Ḥusayn ibn Muḥammad al-Maḥallī.
note_text: In fair naskh/ruqʻah script, in black ink, on white paper; headings and markings in red; titles of the legal issues on the margins, preceded by the word "maṭlab" (question, issue, matter), catchwords.

title: 880-02 Taʻlīm al-mutaʻallim ṭarīq al-taʻallum : manuscript / Burhān al-Dīn al-Zarnūjī.
note_text: 15 x 21.5 cm; written surface: 10.5 x 17 cm; 15 lines per page. Written surface for the excerpt from "Majālis al-abrār wa-masālik al-akhyār": 13.5 x 19 cm; 17-19 lines per page.
